value.title: Deploy applications with Azure DevOps learning path
value.excerpt: Learn how to configure release pipelines that continuously build, test, and deploy your applications.

topItems.title: Create a release pipeline in Azure Pipelines
topItems.excerpt: Set up a continuous delivery (CD) pipeline that automates the process of deploying your application.

images.title: Create a release pipeline in Azure Pipelines

topItems.title: Create a multistage pipeline by using Azure Pipelines
topItems.excerpt: Design and create a realistic release pipeline that promotes changes to various testing and staging environments.

images.title: Create a multistage pipeline by using Azure Pipelines

topItems.title: Manage database changes in Azure Pipelines
topItems.excerpt: Use a release approval in Azure Pipelines to help coordinate database schema changes between developers and database administrators.

images.title: Manage database changes in Azure Pipelines

topItems.title: Run functional tests in Azure Pipelines
topItems.excerpt: Run Selenium UI tests, a form of functional testing, in Azure Pipelines.

images.title: Run functional tests in Azure Pipelines
Create a release pipeline in Azure Pipelines

value.title: Foundations of data science
value.excerpt: This path is intended for beginners that are looking to learn the basics of Python and Data Science

topItems.title: Learn the data science method
topItems.excerpt: Learn about the history and motivation behind data science

images.title: Learn the data science method

topItems.title: Introduction to Python using the datascience library
topItems.excerpt: Learn about programming and data types in Python

images.title: Introduction to Python using the datascience library

topItems.title: Create and manipulate tables using the datascience library
topItems.excerpt: Learn the basics of table manipulation in the datascience library.

images.title: Create and manipulate tables using the datascience library

topItems.title: Design and plot graphs in Python
topItems.excerpt: Learn about plots and graphs in Python

images.title: Design and plot graphs in Python
Learn the data science method

value.title: Work with NoSQL data in Azure Cosmos DB learning path
value.excerpt: In this learning path, find out how to customize NoSQL data storage and distribution with the Azure portal, Cosmos DB extension, and Cosmos DB .NET Core SDK.

topItems.title: Create an Azure Cosmos DB database built to scale
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to create an Azure Cosmos DB account, database, and container built to scale as your application grows.

images.title: Create an Azure Cosmos DB database built to scale

topItems.title: Choose the appropriate API for Azure Cosmos DB storage
topItems.excerpt: You will compare the different APIs available in Azure Cosmos DB, highlighting and contrasting the different scenarios that would make them a good choice for a company.

images.title: Choose the appropriate API for Azure Cosmos DB storage

topItems.title: Insert and query data in your Azure Cosmos DB database
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to add data to your database and query NoSQL data in Azure Cosmos DB.

images.title: Insert and query data in your Azure Cosmos DB database

topItems.title: Store and access graph data in Azure Cosmos DB with the Graph API
topItems.excerpt: Create an application that that uses an Azure Cosmos DB as a graph database. Store, retrieve and manipulate graph data and visualize it using Data Explorer.

images.title: Store and access graph data in Azure Cosmos DB with the Graph API
Create an Azure Cosmos DB database built to scale

value.title: Work with NoSQL data in Azure Cosmos DB
value.excerpt: NoSQL data is an efficient way to store information that doesnâ€™t map to the requirements of a relational SQL database. Learn how to use the Azure portal, the Azure Cosmos DB extension for Visual Studio Code, and the Azure Cosmos DB .NET Core SDK to work with your NoSQL data where you want, and provide your users with high availability, no matter where they are in the world.

topItems.title: Create an Azure Cosmos DB database built to scale
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to create an Azure Cosmos DB account, database, and container built to scale as your application grows.

images.title: Create an Azure Cosmos DB database built to scale

topItems.title: Choose the appropriate API for Azure Cosmos DB storage
topItems.excerpt: You will compare the different APIs available in Azure Cosmos DB, highlighting and contrasting the different scenarios that would make them a good choice for a company.

images.title: Choose the appropriate API for Azure Cosmos DB storage

topItems.title: Insert and query data in your Azure Cosmos DB database
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to add data to your database and query NoSQL data in Azure Cosmos DB.

images.title: Insert and query data in your Azure Cosmos DB database

topItems.title: Store and access graph data in Azure Cosmos DB with the Graph API
topItems.excerpt: Create an application that that uses an Azure Cosmos DB as a graph database. Store, retrieve and manipulate graph data and visualize it using Data Explorer.

images.title: Store and access graph data in Azure Cosmos DB with the Graph API
Create an Azure Cosmos DB database built to scale

value.title: Provision an Azure SQL database to store application data
value.excerpt: Use the Azure Portal and Cloud Shell to provision, connect, and manage Azure SQL databases.

images.title: Provision an Azure SQL database to store application data

value.title: Use automated machine learning in Azure Machine Learning
value.excerpt: Training a machine learning model is an iterative process that requires time and compute resources. Automated machine learning can help make it easier.

value.title: Automate your workflow with GitHub Actions
value.excerpt: Learn how GitHub Actions enables you to automate your software development cycle and deploy applications to Azure.

topItems.title: Introduction to GitHub
topItems.excerpt: Learn to use key GitHub features, including issues, notifications, branches, commits, and pull requests.

images.title: Introduction to GitHub

topItems.title: Automate development tasks by using GitHub Actions
topItems.excerpt: Create a basic GitHub Action and use that action in a workflow.

images.title: Automate development tasks by using GitHub Actions

topItems.title: Build continuous integration (CI) workflows by using GitHub Actions
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to create workflows that enable you to use Continuous Integration (CI) for your projects.

images.title: Build continuous integration (CI) workflows by using GitHub Actions

topItems.title: Build and deploy applications to Azure by using GitHub Actions
topItems.excerpt: Create two deployment workflows using GitHub Actions and Microsoft Azure.

images.title: Build and deploy applications to Azure by using GitHub Actions
Introduction to GitHub

value.title: Build automated workflows to integrate data and apps with Azure Logic Apps
value.excerpt: Azure Logic Apps is a cloud service that automates the execution of your business processes. Learn how to leverage logic apps to create serverless workflows that run automatically when data is available.

topItems.title: Introduction to Azure Logic Apps
topItems.excerpt: Characterize the types of business processes that Logic Apps can automate. Describe the function of connectors, triggers, and actions and show how you combine them to create an app.

images.title: Introduction to Azure Logic Apps

topItems.title: Route and process data automatically using Logic Apps
topItems.excerpt: Define a workflow using built-in triggers, actions, and conditional operators. Your workflow will run automatically when data is available, process the data in the cloud, record results in a database, and send email notifications.

images.title: Route and process data automatically using Logic Apps

topItems.title: Call an API from a Logic Apps workflow using a custom connector
topItems.excerpt: Call any Web API from a Logic App using the custom connector.

images.title: Call an API from a Logic Apps workflow using a custom connector

topItems.title: Create and deploy Logic Apps using Azure Resource Manager templates
topItems.excerpt: Define a Logic Apps workflow declaratively as a Resource Manager template and deploy the app using the Azure Command Line Interface (CLI).

images.title: Create and deploy Logic Apps using Azure Resource Manager templates
Introduction to Azure Logic Apps

value.title: Build JavaScript applications with Node.js
value.excerpt: Node.js provides a large set of built-in APIs that help you build various types of applications, command-line apps, web apps, and more. It also offers testing and debugging capabilities and a rich ecosystem of third-party packages that you can easily add to your application.

topItems.title: Introduction to Node.js
topItems.excerpt: Learn everything about Node.js: what it is, how does it work and when to use it.

topItems.title: Create a new Node.js project and work with dependencies
topItems.excerpt: Create a Node.js project and learn to add packages and manage package dependencies in your project.

topItems.title: Interactively debug Node.js apps with the built-in and Visual Studio Code debuggers
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to efficiently debug your Node.js app using Visual Studio Code to fix your bugs quickly.

topItems.title: Work with files and directories in a Node.js app
topItems.excerpt: Build an app that manipulates files and directories with Node.js.

value.title: Securely connect IoT devices to the cloud
value.excerpt: Interested in building end to end IoT solutions or about Azure IoT, but aren't quite sure what it can do for you? This path is the place to start.

topItems.title: Learn how to manage IoT devices as an IT admin
topItems.excerpt: This module is an introduction to the Internet of Things for IT admins.

images.title: Learn how to manage IoT devices as an IT admin

topItems.title: Automatically provision IoT devices securely and at scale with the Device Provisioning Service
topItems.excerpt: The focus of this module is on creating a Device Provisioning Service (DPS) to securely handle multiple remote devices. First, you create an IoT Hub, and add the DPS service. Next, an X.509 root certificate, and multiple leaf certificates, are created to handle security. Code for a simulated device is provided. You then link all the pieces together, and verify that your DPS resource works. After completing the module, you should have a good understanding of how to provision Azure IoT devices at scale.

images.title: Automatically provision IoT devices securely and at scale with the Device Provisioning Service

topItems.title: Identify anomalies by routing data via IoT Hub to a built-in ML model in Azure Stream Analytics
topItems.excerpt: Learn about Azure IoT Hub message routing, and Stream Analytics anomaly detection. Start by creating an app that simulates issues with conveyor belt vibration. Then, use the Azure portal to route all the data for archiving in blob storage. Finish by routing the vibration data to anomaly detection, using a built-in ML model.

images.title: Identify anomalies by routing data via IoT Hub to a built-in ML model in Azure Stream Analytics

topItems.title: Remotely monitor and control devices with Azure IoT Hub
topItems.excerpt: Create an IoT Hub device app, and a back-end service app. As a scenario, we use the monitoring, and controlling, of the temperature and humidity of a cheese cave.

images.title: Remotely monitor and control devices with Azure IoT Hub
Learn how to manage IoT devices as an IT admin

value.title: Connect your on-premises network to the Microsoft global network by using ExpressRoute
value.excerpt: Connect your on-premises systems and users to Azure and Office 365 by using ExpressRoute for private, dedicated, and guaranteed throughput connectivity.

images.title: Connect your on-premises network to the Microsoft global network by using ExpressRoute

value.title: Secure your identities by using Azure Active Directory
value.excerpt: Secure internal resources, external resources, SaaS applications, and more by using Azure Active Directory. Learn about the features and capabilities of Azure AD.

images.title: Secure your identities by using Azure Active Directory

value.title: Manage users and groups in Azure Active Directory
value.excerpt: Manage users and groups in Azure Active Directory

images.title: Manage users and groups in Azure Active Directory

value.title: Secure and isolate access to Azure resources by using network security groups and service endpoints
value.excerpt: Network security groups and service endpoints help you secure your virtual machines and Azure services from unauthorized network access.

images.title: Secure and isolate access to Azure resources by using network security groups and service endpoints

value.title: Survey the services on the Azure Data platform
value.excerpt: Learn about Azure technologies that analyze text and images and relational, nonrelational, or streaming data. See how data engineers can choose the technologies that meet their business needs and scale to meet demand securely.

images.title: Survey the services on the Azure Data platform

value.title: AI business school for education
value.excerpt: Decision-makers in education have considerations that are particular to their sector to help them realize the true transformational impact of AI in education. It is critical to understand the components of a strategy that will help the education sector create value with AI. This learning path is designed for education decision-makers to illustrate the true transformational impact of AI in education.

topItems.title: Define an AI strategy to create business value
topItems.excerpt: AI has the capacity to empower the whole world to achieve more. From empowering technical development teams to mobilizing an entire organization to unlock the true potential of AI, enterprises need to think strategically about AI â€“ and they need to start today.

images.title: Define an AI strategy to create business value

topItems.title: Define an AI strategy to create value in education
topItems.excerpt: Inâ€¯education, decision-makers mustâ€¯take into accountâ€¯specificâ€¯industryâ€¯considerationsâ€¯before they can realize the true transformational power of AI. Educational institutions and organizations need to think strategically about AIâ€”and they need to start today. To create real value, a comprehensive understanding of all the strategic components is required.

images.title: Define an AI strategy to create value in education

topItems.title: Understand the importance of building an AI-ready culture
topItems.excerpt: A successful AI strategy must consider cultural issues as well as business issues. Becoming an AI-ready organization requires a fundamental transformation in how you do things, how employees relate to each other, what skills they have, and what processes and principles guide your behaviors. This unit is designed to help you understand which are the key elements that make a culture AI-ready and proposes a framework to drive that change in your organization.

images.title: Understand the importance of building an AI-ready culture

topItems.title: Discover how to foster an AI-ready culture in finance
topItems.excerpt: This module is designed for finance and affiliated business decision-makers to illustrate the impact of making strategic decisions with AI. The goal is to enable you to think about AI transformation holistically, with a focus on the cultural changes necessary to make AI transformation successful.

images.title: Discover how to foster an AI-ready culture in finance
Define an AI strategy to create business value

value.title: Azure for the Data Engineer learning path
value.excerpt: This learning path guides data engineers through the evolving benefits your organization gains with Azure cloud data platform technologies.

topItems.title: Understand the evolving world of data
topItems.excerpt: Learn how data systems are evolving and how the changes affect data professionals. Explore the differences between on-premises and cloud data solutions, and consider sample business cases that apply cloud technologies.

images.title: Understand the evolving world of data

topItems.title: Survey the services on the Azure Data platform
topItems.excerpt: Learn about Azure technologies that analyze text and images and relational, nonrelational, or streaming data. See how data engineers can choose the technologies that meet their business needs and scale to meet demand securely.

images.title: Survey the services on the Azure Data platform

topItems.title: Identify the tasks of a data engineer in a cloud-hosted architecture
topItems.excerpt: Learn about the responsibilities of a data engineer. Find out how they relate to the jobs of other data and AI professionals. Explore common data engineering practices and a high-level architecting process for a data-engineering project.

images.title: Identify the tasks of a data engineer in a cloud-hosted architecture
Understand the evolving world of data

value.title: Azure for the Data Engineer
value.excerpt: Explore how the world of data has evolved and how the advent of cloud technologies is providing new opportunities for business to explore. You will learn the various data platform technologies that are available, and how a Data Engineer can take advantage of this technology to an organization benefit.

topItems.title: Understand the evolving world of data
topItems.excerpt: Learn how data systems are evolving and how the changes affect data professionals. Explore the differences between on-premises and cloud data solutions, and consider sample business cases that apply cloud technologies.

images.title: Understand the evolving world of data

topItems.title: Survey the services on the Azure Data platform
topItems.excerpt: Learn about Azure technologies that analyze text and images and relational, nonrelational, or streaming data. See how data engineers can choose the technologies that meet their business needs and scale to meet demand securely.

images.title: Survey the services on the Azure Data platform

topItems.title: Identify the tasks of a data engineer in a cloud-hosted architecture
topItems.excerpt: Learn about the responsibilities of a data engineer. Find out how they relate to the jobs of other data and AI professionals. Explore common data engineering practices and a high-level architecting process for a data-engineering project.

images.title: Identify the tasks of a data engineer in a cloud-hosted architecture
Understand the evolving world of data

value.title: Build AI solutions with Azure Machine Learning service
value.excerpt: Azure includes a variety of services for designing and deploying machine learning models. Learn how to leverage these services in your data analysis.

topItems.title: Introduction to Azure Machine Learning
topItems.excerpt: Introduction to Azure Machine Learning

images.title: Introduction to Azure Machine Learning
Introduction to Azure Machine Learning

topItems.title: Train a machine learning model with Azure Machine Learning
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to use Azure Machine Learning to train a model and register it in a workspace.

images.title: Train a machine learning model with Azure Machine Learning

topItems.title: Working with Data in Azure Machine Learning
topItems.excerpt: Data is the foundation of machine learning. In this module, you will learn how to work with datastores and datasets in Azure Machine Learning, enabling you to build scalable, cloud-based model training solutions.

topItems.title: Working with Compute Contexts in Azure Machine Learning
topItems.excerpt: One of the key benefits of the cloud is the ability to use scalable, on-demand compute resources for cost-effective processing of large data. In this module, you'll learn how to use cloud compute in Azure Machine Learning to run training experiments at scale.

images.title: Introduction to Azure Machine Learning

value.title: Build AI solutions with Azure Machine Learning
value.excerpt: Azure Machine Learning is a cloud platform for training, deploying, managing, and monitoring machine learning models. Learn how to use the Azure Machine Learning Python SDK to create enterprise-ready machine learning solutions.

topItems.title: Introduction to Azure Machine Learning
topItems.excerpt: Introduction to Azure Machine Learning

images.title: Introduction to Azure Machine Learning
Introduction to Azure Machine Learning

topItems.title: Train a machine learning model with Azure Machine Learning
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to use Azure Machine Learning to train a model and register it in a workspace.

images.title: Train a machine learning model with Azure Machine Learning

topItems.title: Working with Data in Azure Machine Learning
topItems.excerpt: Data is the foundation of machine learning. In this module, you will learn how to work with datastores and datasets in Azure Machine Learning, enabling you to build scalable, cloud-based model training solutions.

topItems.title: Working with Compute Contexts in Azure Machine Learning
topItems.excerpt: One of the key benefits of the cloud is the ability to use scalable, on-demand compute resources for cost-effective processing of large data. In this module, you'll learn how to use cloud compute in Azure Machine Learning to run training experiments at scale.

images.title: Introduction to Azure Machine Learning

value.title: Define an AI strategy to create business value across industries
value.excerpt: In this learning path, you will hear from Peter Zemsky, INSEAD's Eli Lilly Chaired Professor of Strategy and Innovation, about how AI is driving business value across industries and companies as well as Microsoft customers and partners. You will be able to discuss how technical teams are bringing AI into business applications and how business leaders of different industries are thinking about AI for their own businesses.

topItems.title: Define an AI strategy to create business value
topItems.excerpt: AI has the capacity to empower the whole world to achieve more. From empowering technical development teams to mobilizing an entire organization to unlock the true potential of AI, enterprises need to think strategically about AI â€“ and they need to start today.

images.title: Define an AI strategy to create business value

topItems.title: Define an AI strategy to create business value in financial services
topItems.excerpt: To realize the true transformational impact of AI in financial services, decision-makers must consider the special factors that apply only to their industry. To create real business value, a comprehensive understanding of all the strategic components is required.

value.title: Discover ways to foster an AI-ready culture in your business
value.excerpt: In this learning path, you will hear from top Microsoft executives about a framework to drive the key changes that are necessary to become an AI -ready organization. You will be able to identify the successful implementations of AI and articulate relevant scenarios. You will be able to discuss a line of business specific and relevant uses cases in finance, marketing, sales, and customer service. And finally, you will be able to identify  AI solutions to implement in your organization based upon its maturity.

topItems.title: Understand the importance of building an AI-ready culture
topItems.excerpt: A successful AI strategy must consider cultural issues as well as business issues. Becoming an AI-ready organization requires a fundamental transformation in how you do things, how employees relate to each other, what skills they have, and what processes and principles guide your behaviors. This unit is designed to help you understand which are the key elements that make a culture AI-ready and proposes a framework to drive that change in your organization.

images.title: Understand the importance of building an AI-ready culture

topItems.title: Discover how to foster an AI-ready culture in finance
topItems.excerpt: This module is designed for finance and affiliated business decision-makers to illustrate the impact of making strategic decisions with AI. The goal is to enable you to think about AI transformation holistically, with a focus on the cultural changes necessary to make AI transformation successful.

images.title: Discover how to foster an AI-ready culture in finance

topItems.title: Discover how to foster an AI-ready culture in marketing
topItems.excerpt: A successful AI strategy in marketing must consider cultural issues as well as business issues. The goal of this module is to enable you to think about AI transformation holistically, with a focus on the cultural changes necessary to make AI transformation successful.

images.title: Discover how to foster an AI-ready culture in marketing

topItems.title: Discover how to foster an AI-ready culture in sales
topItems.excerpt: A successful AI strategy in sales must consider cultural issues, as well as business issues. The goal of this module is to enable you to think about AI transformation holistically, with a focus on the cultural changes necessary to make AI transformation successful.

images.title: Discover how to foster an AI-ready culture in sales
Understand the importance of building an AI-ready culture

value.title: Explore computer vision in Microsoft Azure
value.excerpt: Computer vision is an area of artificial intelligence (AI) in which software systems are designed to perceive the world visually, though cameras, images, and video. There are multiple specific types of computer vision problem that AI engineers and data scientists can solve using a mix of custom machine learning models and platform-as-a-service (PaaS) solutions - including many cognitive services in Microsoft Azure.

topItems.title: Analyze images with the Computer Vision service
topItems.excerpt: The Computer Vision service enables software engineers to create intelligent solutions that extract information from images; a common task in many artificial intelligence (AI) scenarios.

images.title: Analyze images with the Computer Vision service

topItems.title: Classify images with the Custom Vision service
topItems.excerpt: Image classification is a common workload in artificial intelligence (AI) applications. It harnesses the predictive power of machine learning to enable AI systems to identify real-world items based on images.

images.title: Classify images with the Custom Vision service

topItems.title: Detect objects in images with the Custom Vision service
topItems.excerpt: Object detection is a form of computer vision in which artificial intelligence (AI) agents can identify and locate specific types of object in an image or camera feed.

images.title: Detect objects in images with the Custom Vision service

topItems.title: Detect and analyze faces with the Face service
topItems.excerpt: Face detection, analysis, and recognition is an important capability for artificial intelligence (AI) solutions. The Face cognitive service in Azure makes it easy integrate these capabilities into your applications.

images.title: Detect and analyze faces with the Face service
Analyze images with the Computer Vision service

value.title: Explore Natural Language Processing in Microsoft Azure
value.excerpt: Natural language processing supports applications that can see, hear, speak with, and understand users.  They permit the user to interact with your application in natural ways without requiring the user to adapt to the computer model.  Using text analytics, translation, and language understanding services, Microsoft Azure makes it easy to build applications that support natural language.

topItems.title: Analyze text with the Text Analytics service
topItems.excerpt: The Text Analytics service is a cloud-based service that provides advanced natural language processing over raw text for sentiment analysis, key phrase extraction, named entity recognition, and language detection.

images.title: Analyze text with the Text Analytics service

topItems.title: Recognize and synthesize speech
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to recognize and synthesize speech by using Azure Cognitive Services.

images.title: Recognize and synthesize speech

topItems.title: Translate text and speech
topItems.excerpt: Automated translation capabilities in an AI solution enables closer collaboration by removing language barriers.

images.title: Translate text and speech

topItems.title: Create a language model with LUIS
topItems.excerpt: In this module, we'll introduce you to Language Understanding Intelligent Service (LUIS) and show how to create a LUIS application.

images.title: Create a language model with LUIS
Analyze text with the Text Analytics service
